analysis.description:
PartialBasic.addNode (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#196-235) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- rewardStartTime == 0
	- require(bool)(checkpointCandidate > rewardCheckpoint || block.timestamp == rewardTimestamp)

PartialBasic.addNode (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#196-235) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- rewardStartTime == 0
	- require(bool)(checkpointCandidate > rewardCheckpoint || block.timestamp == rewardTimestamp)
PartialBasic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#338-347) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- rewardStartTime == 0
checkpointCandidate in PartialBasic.addNode (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#197-198) is a local variable never initialiazed

PartialBasic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#338-347) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- rewardStartTime == 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#339)

PartialBasic.addNode (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#196-235) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- rewardStartTime == 0 (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#198-209)
	- rewardTimestamp != block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#219-222)
	- require(bool)(checkpointCandidate > rewardCheckpoint || block.timestamp == rewardTimestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0x9081ceb359b6f42640651e11f5bfb4d4b84aa66f.sol#207-208)
